mapper.select: select C.challenge_code, G.category_name, challenge_name, thumbnail, fk_freq_type, frequency, D.set_date , to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate , to_char( startdate + (to_number(fk_during_type) * 7), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as enddate , to_char(hour_start, 'hh24:mi') as hour_start , to_char(hour_end, 'hh24:mi') as hour_end , achievement_pct from tbl_challenge C join tbl_category G on G.category_code = C.fk_category_code join tbl_challenge_during D on D.during_type = C.fk_during_type join tbl_certify_freq F on F.freq_type = C.fk_freq_type join tbl_certify_hour H on H.challenge_code = C.challenge_code join tbl_challenge_info I on I.fk_challenge_code = C.challenge_code where I.fk_userid = #{fk_userid} order by C.challenge_code desc

select C.challenge_code, fk_category_code, G.category_name as category_name, challenge_name, content, regDate , challenge_exp, member_count, thumbnail, fk_freq_type, F.frequency, fk_during_type, D.set_date , to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate, fk_userid , to_char(hour_start, 'hh24:mi') as hour_start, to_char(hour_end, 'hh24:mi') as hour_end , success_img, fail_img, example , to_char( startdate + (to_number(fk_during_type) * 7), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as enddate from tbl_challenge C join tbl_category G on G.category_code = C.fk_category_code join tbl_challenge_during D on D.during_type = C.fk_during_type join tbl_certify_freq F on F.freq_type = C.fk_freq_type join tbl_certify_hour H on H.challenge_code = C.challenge_code join tbl_certify_exam E on E.challenge_code = C.challenge_code where C.challenge_code = #{challenge_code}

mapper.select: select C.challenge_code, challenge_name , fk_freq_type, F.frequency, fk_during_type, D.set_date , to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate , to_char(hour_start, 'hh24:mi') as hour_start , to_char(hour_end, 'hh24:mi') as hour_end , success_img, fail_img, example , to_char( startdate + (to_number(fk_during_type) * 7), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as enddate from tbl_challenge C join tbl_challenge_during D on D.during_type = C.fk_during_type join tbl_certify_freq F on F.freq_type = C.fk_freq_type join tbl_certify_hour H on H.challenge_code = C.challenge_code join tbl_certify_exam E on E.challenge_code = C.challenge_code where C.challenge_code = #{challenge_code}

select ( select nvl(sum(purchase_price), 0) from tbl_deposit where fk_userid = #{fk_userid} and purchase_status = 0 ) - ( select nvl(sum(entry_fee), 0) from tbl_challenge_info where fk_userid = #{fk_userid} ) as user_deposit from dual
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_certify_history (certify_no, fk_userid, fk_challenge_code, certify_time, certify_img) values(certify_no_seq.nextval, #{fk_userid}, #{fk_challenge_code}, default, #{certify_img})
mapper.update: update tbl_challenge set member_count = member_count + 1 where challenge_code = #{fk_challenge_code}
mapper.select: select C.challenge_code, G.category_name, challenge_name, content, thumbnail, fk_freq_type, fk_during_type , to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate , to_char(hour_start, 'hh24:mi') as hour_start , to_char(hour_end, 'hh24:mi') as hour_end , to_char( startdate + (to_number(fk_during_type) * 7), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as enddate , I.fk_userid as fk_userid, entry_fee from tbl_challenge C join tbl_category G on G.category_code = C.fk_category_code join tbl_challenge_during D on D.during_type = C.fk_during_type join tbl_certify_freq F on F.freq_type = C.fk_freq_type join tbl_certify_hour H on H.challenge_code = C.challenge_code join tbl_challenge_info I on I.fk_challenge_code = C.challenge_code where C.challenge_code = #{challenge_code} and I.fk_userid = #{fk_userid}

select certify_no, fk_userid, fk_challenge_code, certify_time, certify_img from tbl_certify_history where
fk_userid = #{fk_userid} and
fk_challenge_code = #{challenge_code} order by certify_no desc

select count(*) as member_count , avg(achievement_pct) as achievement_pct_avg , count (case when achievement_pct = 100 then 1 end) as hundredCnt , count (case when achievement_pct >= 80 and not (achievement_pct = 100) then 2 end) as eighty_up_cnt , count (case when achievement_pct < 80 then 3 end) as eighty_down_cnt from tbl_challenge_info where fk_challenge_code = #{challenge_code}

select to_char(startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate , (select count(*) from tbl_certify_history where fk_userid = #{fk_userid} and fk_challenge_code = #{fk_challenge_code}) as certifycnt , case when (to_char(startdate, 'D') between 2 and 6 and fk_freq_type in ('100', '101')) or (to_char(startdate, 'D') in (1, 7) and fk_freq_type = '102') then to_number(decode(fk_freq_type, '100', 7, '101', 5, '102', 2, 0)) * to_number(fk_during_type) + 1 when to_char(startdate, 'D') in (1, 7) and fk_freq_type = '100' then to_number(decode(fk_freq_type, '100', 7, '101', 5, '102', 2, 0)) * to_number(fk_during_type) + 1 else to_number(decode(fk_freq_type, '100', 7, '101', 5, '102', 2, 0)) * to_number(fk_during_type) end as totalcertify , trunc((select count(*) from tbl_certify_history where fk_userid = #{fk_userid} and fk_challenge_code = #{fk_challenge_code}) / case when (to_char(startdate, 'D') between 2 and 6 and fk_freq_type in ('100', '101')) or (to_char(startdate, 'D') in (1, 7) and fk_freq_type = '102') then to_number(decode(fk_freq_type, '100', 7, '101', '102', 2, 0)) * to_number(fk_during_type) + 1 when to_char(startdate, 'D') in (1, 7) and fk_freq_type = '100' then to_number(decode(fk_freq_type, '100', 7, '101', '102', 2, 0)) * to_number(fk_during_type) + 1 else to_number(decode(fk_freq_type, '100', 7, '101', '102', 2, 0)) * to_number(fk_during_type) end * 100 ) as achievement_pct from tbl_challenge c join tbl_challenge_during d on d.during_type = c.fk_during_type join tbl_certify_freq f on f.freq_type = c.fk_freq_type join tbl_challenge_info i on i.fk_challenge_code = c.challenge_code where c.challenge_code = #{fk_challenge_code} and i.fk_userid = #{fk_userid}
mapper.insert: update tbl_challenge_info set achievement_pct = to_number(#{achievement_pct}) where fk_userid = #{fk_userid} and fk_challenge_code = #{fk_challenge_code}
